name: 夢之拼圖大學
description:
『Hachi Studio』's Debut Game - Puzzle University

Dream Puzzle University is an adventure puzzle game developed by Hachi Studio. Players take on the role of the male protagonist, traveling back to their college days in a dream, and rekindling memories with three friends of the opposite gender who shared an unspeakable bond.

Game Features:


  • Three captivating characters: The game features a cool senior, a sweet junior, and a childhood friend, each with their own unique memories and stories.
  • Puzzle-solving: Players must piece together memories through puzzles, restoring dream scenes, and unraveling mysteries.
  • Dialogue choices: Players make choices during conversations to advance the story and affect the outcome.
  • Multiple endings: The game has three different endings, each reflecting different relationships and emotional paths with the characters. After experiencing all endings, players can unlock a hidden easter egg.

CG

  • This game contains a total of 28 exquisite CG

Dream Puzzle University is a game filled with memories and emotions, taking players back to the past to savor their youth. Wishing all gentlemen sweet dreams!
